name: Barry S. DERNOVSEK, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Dernovsek v. Commonwealth, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing

parties: Barry S. DERNOVSEK, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of April, 1988, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED in accordance with this Court’s decision in Sullivan v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, — Pa. -, 708 A.2d 481 (1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
Barry S. DERNOVSEK, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
No. 0372 W.D. Allocatur Docket 1997.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 1, 1998.
